title: (Tues Early Bird) Rejected Segments! + Life Advice 2022 Edition + Mailbag: My Best Friend Is Cheating…and She Doesn’t Know, That I Know!
itunes:title: (Tues Early Bird) Rejected Segments! + Life Advice 2022 Edition + Mailbag: My Best Friend Is Cheating…and She Doesn’t Know, That I Know!
description:
Bobby shares the Top 5 rejected segments from the last month. We each share our best piece of advice that we learned in the last year. In the mailbag, Bobby helps a listener who just found out her best friend was cheating.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
